shared.model.turn

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.turn.ActionManager

  • public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Action interface object for performing actions on one's turn while participating in a game.
    Author:
    jchrisw

      • canDoPlay

        public boolean canDoPlay(ActionType action,
                ResourceType[] toPassIn)
        The overloaded function of the previously defined one below. It takes in an array to verify that the bank has the cards you want. But checks to see if you can play the cards listed so it checks the turn they were played as it goes down the line. *
        Parameters:
        action -
        toPassIn -
        Returns:
        if you can play the card or not

      • canDoPlay

        public boolean canDoPlay(ActionType action)
        Not sure if we need javadoc for CanDo's. I don't think so. But this method passes you on to the correct method in the PlayCard class and returns whether or not you can play a certain card. This method is overloaded with a resource array just prior to the definition of this method
        Parameters:
        action -
        Returns:
        if you can play the card or not
